Catherine Kennedy

Website: catherinekennedy.com.au

Catherine Kennedy is a painter and installation artist who lives and works in Sydney and the Blue Mountains. Her work explores the intersection of conscious and subconscious experience, bringing together the experiential, the remembered, the imaginative and the emotional to create new narratives. Like fragments of a dream, image, metaphor and text recombine to suggest new interpretations and meanings beyond the simply perceptual.

Catherine Kennedy
November 2013

Pearls

Pearls was painted in 2013, but has become somewhat prophetic. Essentially it talks about fear and of a kind of a free-floating anxiety about things material and immaterial: of a future that may be no future at al ...read more
